title: Sébastien Gimenez
text:
Sébastien Gimenez (born March 21, 1974 in <a href="Avignon">Avignon</a>) is a French professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player. Currently, he plays in the <a href="Ligue%202">Ligue 2</a> for <a href="N%C3%AEmes%20Olympique">Nîmes Olympique</a>.
He played on the professional level in the <a href="Ligue%202">Ligue 2</a> for <a href="FC%20S%C3%A8te">FC Sète</a>.
